title: BIS unveils 7-step security framework for blockchain-based CBDCs
description:
The Bank for International Settlements (BIS) introduced a security framework on July 7 to help central banks develop secure digital currencies. BIS noted that central bank digital currencies (CBDCs) will become “critical national infrastructure” in the future. And cyber attacks against critical infrastructure are among the top five risks with the most significant potential impact. […]

The post BIS unveils 7-step security framework for blockchain-based CBDCs appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: JPMorgan Analysts Say Spot Bitcoin ETF Approval Is ‘Unlikely to Be a Game Changer for Crypto Markets’
description: In a report published on Thursday, JPMorgan analysts suggest that the approval of a spot bitcoin exchange-traded fund (ETF) by the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) is “unlikely to be a game changer for crypto markets.” The market strategists at the American banking giant emphasize that similar spot bitcoin ETFs already exist internationally, but […]

title: US Debt Explodes by $865,000,000,000 in One Month – Larger Than Finland, Hong Kong and Greece’s Combined GDP
description:
The US national debt has surged by nearly a trillion dollars in just one month. title: Bitcoin (BTC) Ordinal Volume Explodes by a Staggering 2,834% in 2023 Q2, According to DappRadar
description:
Bitcoin’s (BTC) ordinal volume has exploded by a staggering 2,834% in the second quarter of 2023, according to the blockchain intelligence platform DappRadar. DappRadar notes in a new quarterly report that Bitcoin ordinal volume increased from $7.18 million in Q1 to $210.7 million in Q2. Bitcoin ordinals allow users to inscribe digital assets such as […]
